en.sc1: Consider a blockchain network were we have four nodes, 1-4.
en.sc2: Suppose that node 1 proposes a block to be added.
en.sc3: However, node 4 also proposes a block at the same time.
en.sc4: A fork appears in the blockchain and other nodes begin adding to both branches.
en.sc5: As the network grows off these branches, one branch continues to grow longer than the other.
en.sc6: Since node 4's branch becomes longer, its sub-blockchain continues to be apart of the actual chain and node 1's branch is discarded.
